title: Walmart IN3 Bangalore offer Jan 2023
content:
Education: Tier 1 College CS
Years of Experience: 2.5
Prior Experience: Oracle
For experienced engineer, what's your current and past experience? Working at Oracle as MTS
Current salary: 15.5 + 13L RSUs yearly ~ 28L
Company: Walmart
Title/Level: IN3
Location: Bangalore
Salary:19LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 8L Joining bonus
Stock bonus: 4.5L new hire RSUs
Bonus: 20% of base ~ 3.7L
Annual Stock: 25% of base ~ 4.5L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~28L
Benefits: Standard I guess
Other details: Recruitment process was not good. HR made me do an interview while I was out of station on the last working day of 2023. Multiple times I've seen HR not caring about my concerns at all. Even while negotiating she's rude and doesn't even let me put my points forth.

Looks like she's lowballing me. I know Walmart payband for this role goes up to 29L in base. Are there any arguments I can put forth to make her increase this? She seemed quite bent that she can't increase more than this

title: Coding Blocks | Product Engineer & Instructor | Noida
content:
```
Education: B Tech in Computer Science [Tier-3], 2023
Years of Experience: 8 Months at Startup
Prior Experience: 0
Date of the Offer: Dec-2023
Company: Coding Blocks
Title/Level: Product Engineer and Instructor
Location: Noida 
Salary: 7,00,000/- (Rupees Seven lakh only)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus:NA
Bonus: 1,00,000/- (Rupees One Lakhs only), Paid After Completion of 1 Year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):  7,00,000+1,00,000 = 8,00,000/- 
Benefits:1 off day a week
Other details: 10,000/- (Rupees Ten Thousad For 10 days Traning Before Joining).
```

title: Cognizant Offer
